page.title: 18CAERWYS HALL FARM
page.content:
Mr.& Mrs.Owens run the farm with the help of their son John. The family have farmed Caerwys Hall since 1885. At present the land has been divided into 160 acres of pasture, 70 acres of barley and 50 acres of woodland.
Until recently it had been a dairy farm,but the emphasis now is on the production of beef with 187 beef cattle.there are three suckling cows, 202 breeding ewes(20 pedigree suffork ewes for breeding rams), 7 horses and 2 dozen hens.
They have 3 tractors, grass toppers,a plough,manure spreader. Most of the animal feed is bought from Messrs.George A.Rees & Son(Caerwys)Ltd.
